metadata.title: AI Meme Generator - Create Viral Memes Instantly
metadata.description: Generate hilarious memes with AI. Choose your style, describe your idea, and create shareable content in seconds.

page.title: AI Meme Generator
page.description: Create viral memes with the power of AI. Just describe your idea and let our AI generate the perfect meme for you.

generator.title: AI Meme Generator

form.prompt_placeholder: e.g., A surprised cat looking at a cucumber, funny reaction meme

generator.no_memes_generated: No memes generated yet. Describe your idea above!

error.timeout: Generation timed out. Please try again.
error.no_result: No meme was generated. Please retry.

community.title: Meme Community
community.description: Browse and share the funniest AI-generated memes
community.empty: No memes yet. Be the first to create one!

card.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this meme?

templates.title: Meme Templates
templates.description: Browse our collection of popular meme templates. Click any template to start editing and create your own viral memes.
templates.semantic_search_placeholder: Describe what you want to express... e.g. "feeling frustrated" or "celebrating a win"
templates.no_results: No templates found. Try a different search term.
templates.no_semantic_results: No matching templates found. Try different keywords.

metadata.title: Meme Templates - Popular Meme Generator Templates
metadata.description: Browse 60+ popular meme templates including Drake, Distracted Boyfriend, and more. Start creating your own memes now!

textToMeme.title: Turn Any Text Into a Meme
textToMeme.subtitle: Just describe what you want - our AI picks the perfect template and writes the captions
textToMeme.placeholder: Describe your meme idea... e.g., 'when you finally finish a project' or 'programmers vs normal people'
textToMeme.try_it_free: Try it free - no signup required
textToMeme.no_results: Describe your idea above and click Generate!

batch.title: Batch Generate from Topic
batch.subtitle: Enter a topic and get multiple meme variations at once
batch.topic_placeholder: Enter a topic... e.g., 'Monday mornings' or 'remote work'

error.failed: Failed to generate memes. Please try again.

editor.title: Meme Editor
editor.description: Create custom memes with our easy-to-use editor
editor.select_template_first: Select a template or upload an image to get started
editor.no_text_boxes: No text boxes. Click 'Add Text' to create one.
